TopicTitle: Monoprop containers still in wrong weight?

Articles.Content: As topic. According to wiki, the Stratus-V, though had fuel decrease, also come with weight increase. However, I still have the weight as its old value. Is my installation bugged?
Existing craft should have the old values but anything new should have tanks that weigh 0.1t and have 80kg of monoprop.
Additionally, some stock craft still have tanks with the old values.
Just realize the chaneg in values on Wiki is talking about the dry weight.
